name: tgs-crew-creator
description: The Crew Creator Application for the Takapuna Grammar School Rowing Club

scripts.init: npm i; cd public; npm i ;cd ..; npm run init:db
scripts.init:db: npm run init:drop-db; echo "setting up db"; cd ./util;echo "compiling"; tsc ./initSchema.ts --outDir ./.tmp --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata;echo "running" node ./tmp/util/initSchema.js; rm -rf ./.tmp
scripts.init:drop-db: mysql -u root -e "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS HUDSON_CURREN_TGS_CREW_CREATOR; CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS HUDSON_CURREN_TGS_CREW_CREATOR;"

author: Hudson Curren <hudson.curren@icloud.com>
